lead_paragraph: President Roosevelt's order to the Maritime Commission to assemble a pool of 2,000,000 tons of existing shipping to speed the flow of vital war materials to Britain recognizes that the most critical battle of the war is the battle of the Atlantic.
abstract: ed, Ships to win the war
snippet: President Roosevelt's order to the Maritime Commission to assemble a pool of 2,000,000 tons of existing shipping to speed the flow of vital war materials to Britain recognizes that the most critical battle of the war is the battle of the Atlantic....
